column5: Our Condo is fully remodeled and has a wonderful ocean view from the balcony. The beach is located directly in front of the resort with only a short walk to the beach, 61st street fishing pier and restaurants. Located in the Casa Del Mar resort that offers two tropical pools, a barbecue area and laundry facilities on site. Very close to Pleasure Pier, Moody Gardens and Schlitterbahn. Comfortably sleeps 4 adults and 2 children with 2 queen beds and junior bunk beds.
column8: Best Rates!!! Beach Front Condo In Casa del Mar
